name: NSSharingService
desc: A service that lets users share content with other services, such as social media services, or apps, such as Mail and Safari.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: Specifies the delegate of the sharing service.

items.name: menuItemTitle
items.desc: The title of the service in the Share menu.

items.name: title
items.desc: The title of the sharing service.

items.name: accountName
items.desc: The account name used for posting on Twitter or Sina Weibo.

items.name: sharingServices
items.desc: Returns a list of sharing services which could share all the provided items together.

items.name: canPerform
items.desc: Returns whether the service can share all the specified items.

items.name: perform
items.desc: Manually performs the service on the provided items.

items.name: recipients
items.desc: An array containing the user handles of the desired recipients.

items.name: alternateImage
items.desc: The alternate image representing the sharing service.

items.name: image
items.desc: The primary image representing the sharing service.

items.name: attachmentFileURLs
items.desc: An array of NSURL objects representing the files that were shared.

items.name: messageBody
items.desc: The message body as a string.

items.name: permanentLink
items.desc: A permanent URL (permalink) that your app can use to access the post.
